data.title: Aggressive A Main to Ramp TP + Vents Trip
data.description: Use this simple, but strong setup to aggressively fight for A Main control. This allows you to quickly set up a different angle to contest from, while stalling potential Attackers pushing from Vents.

data.title: A Ramp to Vents Trademark and Rendezvous
data.description: Set up an aggressive peek towards A Main like so, to allow yourself for a quick rotation and potential pick towards Mid.

data.title: Vents + Ramp Trademark And Mid Rendezvous Peek
data.description: Set up an aggressive fight towards Mid with this combination of utility, and letting you reposition to take a fight towards Ramp quickly.
